//cross testing
CHECK_EQUAL(expr_to_truthtable(
	4, truthtable_to_expr("1101001000100010")),
	"1101001000100010");
CHECK_EQUAL(expr_to_truthtable(
	6, truthtable_to_expr(	
	"1111110111011101111111111111111111111101110111011111110111011101")),
	"1111110111011101111111111111111111111101110111011111110111011101");
